scene.name: intro
scene.line: You are at the edge of a massive hole. The dirt gives way to rock as the ground sinks into darkness.
The computer tied to your upper back slickens with sweat in the afternoon sun.
The rope slung around your shoulder has slipped under the strap of your backpack, digging uncomfortably against your collar bone.

scene.name: cave-entrance-options
scene.option: There's got to be a way to do this safely, right?
Go down into the hole, that seems pretty obvious.
Lean in a bit and check it out?
Maybe we need to climb down more carefully?
Shine the lamp into the hole?
Yell into the hole first to see if there are pirates!
Try using the rope to climb down safely.

scene.name: cave-entrance-lamp
scene.line: The lamplight only reaches a few yards down the hole, where the rock is coated in a slimy black mold. You can tell that the walls are too slick to climb safely without assistance.

scene.name: cave-entrance-yell
scene.line: I only understood you as far as wanting to yell.
At least we know there's no pirates.

scene.name: cave-entrance-rope
scene.line: The rope is tied snugly to a tree trunk.
Your feet slip a few times on the slimy rock, but you remain stable. *LULA* and *JOSEPH* descend carefully after you.

scene.name: cave-entrance-persistence
scene.line: Your feet slip a few times on the slimy rock, but you remain stable. *LULA* and *JOSEPH* descend carefully after you.

scene.name: cave-entrance-die
scene.line: The cave walls are too slick to climb safely without assistance. You lose your footing and fall to your death.
